title: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder after setting aliases in dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for the columns.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new data source and dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The old column names will be displayed instead of the aliases set for the columns.
